src:
Serangan Granat di Kashmir Srinagar, Satu Orang Tewas dan 45 Luka-luka
05 Nov 2019, 05:11 by Indra Komara
Kashmir - Serangan granat terjadi di kota utama Kashmir, Srinagar. Serangan ini mengakibatkan satu orang tewas dan 45 orang terluka.
Dikutip Reuters, Senin (4/11/2019), dari 45 orang yang mengalami luka, tiga di antaranya merupakan polisi paramiliter India. Ketiganya telah mendapat perawatan intensif di rumah sakit, satu di antaranya kritis.
"satu orang telah tewas dan setidaknya 14 lainnya cedera," kata VK Birdi, salah seorang pejabat tinggi kepolisian Srinagar.
Lembah Kashmir yang berpenduduk mayoritas Muslim yang diklaim oleh India dan Pakistan telah dalam kekacauan sejak New Delhi mengumumkan akan melepaskan wilayah otonomi dan kenegaraan yang telah lama dipegangnya.
India mematikan internet dan menangkap ribuan orang dalam penumpasan bersejarah yang disebut bertujuan mencegah kerusuhan. Sementara kelompok-kelompok militan yang menentang aturannya telah menyerang pekerja migran dari tempat lain di negara itu.

(idn/fai)
text:
Grenade Attack on Kashmir Srinagar, One person was killed and 45 injured
05 Nov 2019, 05:11 by Indra Komara
Kashmir - A grenade attack took place in the main city of Kashmir, Srinagar. This attack resulted in one person killed and 45 people injured.
Quoted by Reuters on Monday (4/11/2019), of the 45 people who suffered injuries, three of them are Indian paramilitary police. All three have received intensive care at the hospital, one of whom is critical.
"one person has been killed and at least 14 others injured," said VK Birdi, one of Srinagar's top police officials.
The Muslim-majority Kashmir Valley claimed by India and Pakistan has been in turmoil since New Delhi announced it would renounce its long-held autonomous and statehood.
India shut down the internet and arrested thousands of people in a historic crackdown called for the purpose of preventing riots. While militant groups who oppose its rules have attacked migrant workers from elsewhere in the country.

(idn / fai)
